author: _drinkcoffee
content: I will get back to work on the function id / function selector option on Monday.

author: _drinkcoffee
content: Has anyone got statistics on what proportion of contracts deployed on Ethereum MainNet were written in Solidity? This is something I have been working on guesstimating. It would be good to have independent validation of the number I come up with.

author: sky.cactus
content: It would be difficult to identify which contracts were written in Solidity vs not.
